quoteFirst: The nine Federalists alone opposed his motion, which was at length adopted by a majority of two to one. By a vote of
quoteLast: Judge Pickering was declared “guilty as charged” in the articles of impeachment; and by a vote of twenty to six the Senate resolved that he ought to be removed from office.

quoteFirst: Madison, however, did not readily desist from his purpose, and a few months later, June 26, he sent a message to the Senate, stating that the considerations previously leading him to nominate a minister to Russia had since been strengthened, and again naming Mr. Adams for the post. quoteLast: , Mr. Pickering, of course, being one of the still hostile minority.
